Adhuthu newspaper. nuclear deal pathi.. good! aana aduthu kercheif color poitiye machi?? seri.. supplement la evanda open panna udane first page la 55 vayasu kandraviya podradhu? so, nee thaan thedi pidichi paathuruka! tamil papera vidu.. comments.author: Pradep
comments.content: @Jegan Empa Jegan . Nee innum valaranum . Naanlaam Paper edutha oru news kooda padikkaama vidamaaten . Headlines la irunthu , head and shoulders vilambaram varaikkum full a padichittu thaan veppen . Oru Tumbler paal la oru thuli vesham kalandhaalum adhu vesham thaan , illenna tamil cinema stlye a oru anda saambaarla oru balli vizhunthaalum athu vesham thaan . So evvalavo nalla thagavalgal irunthaalum , intha maathiri siru kedu galaala namma sandhadhiyar kettu poraanga. Naan adhallam thadukkanumnu nenaikkaren . Ippo torrents a example a eduthukkoen . Oru torrent a evano oruthan RISK eduthu download panni . pathu ORIGINAL a FAKE a VIRUS a nnu comment adikkaraan paaru . En ? Avan FAKE a iruntha appadiye vittulaame , en vandhu DONT DOWNLOAD FAKE CONTENT apdinnu oru comment pannanum . Athaan nalla manasu da . Mathavanganga adhilairunthu vilagi irukkanumnu nenaikkara unnadha jeevan da . Andha maari thaan naanum . :-P Ithukku melayum adippen , aana enakke sirippu varuthu =))
